short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a feature-rich Chrome-based extension designed to enhance business operations by integrating with WhatsApp Web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WhatsApp CRM is a feature-rich Chrome-based extension designed to enhance business operations by integrating with WhatsApp Web. It provides tools for managing sales, customer relationships, and support within the familiar WhatsApp interface.
